DIV.P: Which of the following algebraic expressions matches the phrase, "the quotient of eight and a number"?

DIV.name: hm_flash_widget

DIV.P: The word "quotient" indicates division. You can use any variable, say x, to stand for "a number".
The phrase is "the quotient of 8 and a number", not "a number and 8." So, the matching expression is .
